task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)

about: Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance. Check out our <DocsLink>documentation</DocsLink> to learn more.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Boomerang Tasks
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Zentara wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Zentara wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: Zentara wants to read multiple files:
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: Zentara wants to read this file and {{count}} more:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Zentara wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Zentara wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Zentara wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Zentara wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: Zentara wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: Zentara performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Zentara wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Zentara wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Zentara wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Zentara wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Zentara viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Zentara wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Zentara recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Zentara wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Zentara viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Zentara wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: Zentara wants to search the codebase for {{query}}:
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: Zentara wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Zentara wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Zentara wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Zentara wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Zentara wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Zentara wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Zentara wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Zentara Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

announcement.title: ðŸŽ‰ Zentara Code {{version}} Released
announcement.description: Zentara Code {{version}} , the first comprehensive open-source runtime debugging AI coder, is now available! This release introduces several powerful features to enhance your coding experience.
announcement.feature1: <bold>Runtime Interactive Debugging</bold>: Zentara code can interactively debug your code in runtime, allowing you to inspect variables, step through code, and fix issues on the fly.
announcement.feature2: <bold>Catch Exceptions </bold>: Context condensing is now enabled by default with configurable settings for when automatic condensing happens
announcement.feature3: <bold>Manual Condensing Button</bold>: New button in the task header allows you to manually trigger context condensing at any time
announcement.feature4: <bold>Enhanced Condensing Settings</bold>: Fine-tune when and how automatic condensing occurs through the <contextSettingsLink>Context Settings</contextSettingsLink>

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.ZentaraWantsToUse: Zentara wants to use the browser:

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile violates your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the Zentara Code settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: Zentara has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?

debug.wantsToExecute: Zentara wants to execute debug operation: {{operation}}
